name: Asia Pacific Conference on Education Research ,Social Science & Humanities
content: Welcome to the Asia Pacific Conference on Education Research ,Social Science & Humanities (APCERSSH-2022) which will take place in Bangkok on September 7th and 8th, 2022\. We aims to bring together leading academic scientists, researchers and research scholars to exchange and share their experiences and research results on all aspects of Future Trends in education research ,Social science & Humanities. It also provides a premier interdisciplinary platform for researchers, practitioners and educators to present and discuss the most recent innovations, trends, and concerns as well as practical challenges encountered and solutions adopted in the fields of Education research ,Social science & Humanities.
